course_title: Special Topics, Variable: Cities, Power, and Cinema
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 16 / Seats Avail: 3Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes: The seminar will view and critique the 'reel city' in relation to the "real city." It will explore definitions of power and powerlessness, using films about cities as visual texts for studying the possession and use (and perhaps abuse) of political power by groups in urbanized places of the US and beyond the US (e.g., France and Brazil).
course_description: This is a variable credit course; special topics class in Political Science that will be a variation of a senior seminar.
